item.description:
LOOK FOR THE NATIVES BANNER!

This event was founded by Boston Herald Columnist Steve Buckley.

See facebook and the site for details:[url=http://www.oldtimebaseball.com/] and updates.

  http://www.oldtimebaseball.com/[/url].

 The Annual Injured Workers Pharmacy Old Time Baseball Game will take place on Thursday, August 11 at 7pm in St. Peters Field North Cambridge. What makes the Old Time Baseball Game so special is its dazzling collections of old uniforms that represent virtually every era in baseball history. The game offers a glimpse of what it was like in the old days. This years game is being played as a benefit for the C2 Missionto benefit children and families affected by Cystic Fibrosis. Admission is free. Food and memorabilia will be available for purchase. Fans are asked to bring a lawn chair and camp out along the foul lines. 

Donations are welcome.

 

Please look for Mindy with our redsoxnatives.com banner at the event.

Allow extra time for commute and parking as this event draws a huge crowd.

Thanks,

Fenway frank
item.how_to_find_us: Natives E Mail & Coordinate with each other Look for the Natives Banner
item.name: Old Time Baseball Game at St. Peter's Field, North Cambridge
